featured.text: The BBC once reported that Swiss farmers were experiencing a spaghetti crop and showed scenes of people harvesting noodles from trees.

definition.zh_def: 一種長條形的意大利麵，通常用小麥粉和水製成。
definition.en_def: A type of long, thin pasta made from wheat flour and water.
definition.example: I love to eat spaghetti with marinara sauce.
